name: tentree Juniper Classic Hoodie - Men's
description:
A dreamy, soft hoodie with a graphic that suggests perfect horizons.Made from a recycled polyester and organic cotton blend.Cork drawcord tabs.Regular fit offers no surprises, just comfort.tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that 10 trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.
